basics.name: Sam Safaei
basics.label: Product Management / Software Architecture
basics.summary: With over 15 years of experience, I have excelled in product and software project management, software engineering, test and verification, and leadership across various stages of the software lifecycle. As a Product Owner, Project Manager, and Senior Consultant, I have driven requirement gathering, roadmap prioritization, and strategic cross-functional collaboration to deliver complex software solutions and guide organizations in achieving modular, scalable architectures. My expertise includes client interaction, agile leadership, and backlog management, underpinned by a strong foundation in software development using C++, Python, and DevOps practices. I bring a proven ability to align technical execution with business goals, optimize processes, and deliver impactful, high-quality solutions in dynamic environments while advising clients on strategic software transformations.

work.name: Modular Management
work.summary: Consulting firm focused on modular product architecture and platform strategy. We assist clients to align software requirements with scalable platform architectures, enabling reuse, reducing complexity, and moving from isolated product developments to modular scalable platform developemt enabling several product verticals.
highlights: Led cross-functional workshops utilizing Modular Function Deployment (MFD) to develop modular product architectures that balance customer needs, engineering requirements, and business strategies
Collaborated with client leadership to align software, hardware, and mechanical design strategies, promoting cross-disciplinary integration and platform scalability
Identified and addressed critical pain points in existing architectures, fostering cross-disciplinary alignment and driving strategic improvements
Guided clients in integrating business objectives into architectural planning, ensuring alignment with long-term strategic goals
